qas.question: What term describes the number and variety of plants, animals and other organisms in existence?
What ensures the survival of human species by providing food, shelter, other resources to mankind?

answers.text: the climatic conditions and area of the region

qas.question: What term describes all the species of plants in existence?
What term describes the components of insects?
What ensures the survival of human species by providing insects?

plausible_answers.text: the climatic conditions and area of the region

qas.question: What term describes all the species of insects in existence?
How many species of insects are known to date?

context: The number and variety of plants, animals and other organisms that exist is known as <a0_0><a1_0><b4_0><b5_0>biodiversity<b5_0/><b4_0/><a1_0/><a0_0/>. It is an essential component of nature and it ensures the survival of human species by providing food, fuel, shelter, medicines and other resources to mankind. The richness of biodiversity depends on <a2_0><b6_0>the climatic conditions and area of the region<b6_0/><a2_0/>. All species of plants taken together are known as <a3_0><b7_0>flora<b7_0/><a3_0/> and about <b8_0>70,000<b8_0/> species of plants are known till date. All species of animals taken together are known as fauna which includes birds, mammals, fish, reptiles, insects, crustaceans, molluscs, etc.
